Text: Berhampur (IPA: /bərɵmpu:r /) is a municipal corporation located on the eastern coastline of Ganjam district of the Indian state of Odisha in East India, about 169 km south of the state capital Bhubaneshwar and 255 km north of Visakhapatnam in Andhra Pradesh.
